message:
There was a SAML SSO validation of error code 4. This is a special type of error that means something more serious is wrong (compared to a standard login error). 

We should determine whether this is due to a mismatch in the school's SSO settings or if it's a widespread issue. If the monitor recovers after taking action, the issue has likely been resolved. 

For more information: [Education Incident Runbooks - SSO: SAML Validation Error](https://joinhandshake.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EPD/pages/865566925/Education+Incident+Runbooks#SSO:-SAML-Validation-Error)
